alert.note: Alert for Southern Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 13 at 8:23AM MDT until July 13 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING FOR LIGHTNING THIS AFTERNOON AND EARLY EVENING... .Scattered thunderstorms will develop early this afternoon in the Southern Highlands and decrease by mid evening. Very dry air near the ground will mean little rainfall from storms, with gusty outflow winds 40-55 mph possible. Additionally, humidities will be near 15 percent this afternoon with breezy southwest winds, which will further elevate fire weather conditions. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR LIGHTNING FOR SOUTHERN HIGHLANDS...WHICH IS FIRE WEATHER ZONE 426... The National Weather Service in Boise has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from noon today to 9 PM MDT this evening. * THUNDERSTORMS...Scattered. * OUTFLOW WINDS...40-55 mph.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will occur shortly.
